items.sentence: Just because you didn't get into Harvard doesn't mean it's the end of the world.
They're building something across the street, but we're not yet sure what it is.
Are you sure Tom and Mary are married? I thought that they were just colleagues.
Tom's was the first name on the list of persons of interest after Mary's murder.
Tom agreed to go with me, so we said goodbye to the others, and went on our way.
